Resource Management

Comprehensive guide for optimizing MARVIS’s resource usage across different hardware configurations.

Note

This guide is under development. Please refer to the configuration guide for basic resource settings.

Overview

MARVIS provides intelligent resource management for:

  • GPU memory optimization

  • CPU usage balancing

  • Disk cache management

  • Model loading strategies

Coming Soon

This technical guide will cover:

  • Memory profiling and optimization

  • Multi-GPU strategies

  • Distributed inference

  • Cache strategies and cleanup

  • Performance benchmarking

Interim Resources

See Configuration Guide for basic resource configuration options.
